"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a9d5e963687222acfe0200#post_54a9d5e963687222acfe0200
I can access the sites just fine, it's just that some things don't load correctly.

For some reason, the image problem I had with Derpibooru is gone here, but still there on other sites

+Widespread problems+ 
Static images don't load or are glitched, and gifs go transparent at some points in the loop or only load part of the loop

+Site-specific problems+
DeviantArt doesn't allow me to view notifications

dA and Imgur have problems loading the header as well as some other button related things

Wikia doesn't load comment sections
